responses.s0_q0: Partially: A strategy exists but is incomplete, outdated, or only partially aligned with national strategies.
responses.s0_q1: No: No such unit or office exists.
responses.s0_q3: No: No clear roles or responsibilities.
responses.s1_q0: Partially: Architecture is partially developed or not regularly maintained.
responses.s1_q1: Yes: An EDM is in place, covering descriptive, diagnostic, predictive, and prescriptive analytics.
responses.s1_q2: No: No models have been reviewed or approved by NPC.
responses.s2_q0: Yes: The policy is published and aligned with national standards.
responses.s2_q1: Partially: Some activities are conducted, but not systematically or regularly.
responses.s2_q2: Partially: Some KPIs or scorecards exist, but monitoring is inconsistent.
responses.s3_q0: Yes: A formal, published policy exists and is aligned with national standards.
responses.s3_q1: Yes: A comprehensive MDM program and plan are operational.
responses.s3_q2: Yes: All reference data/classifications are coordinated and approved by NPC.
